name.baseName: Soap and synthetic detergent ; Surfactants, oils and fats, caustic soda, acids, etc. ; Compounding process ; All sizes; NESPS2
肥皂及合成洗涤剂① ; 表面活性剂、油脂、烧碱、酸类等② ; 复配工艺 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisPhysical + chemical + biofilm process，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management95

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisPhysical + chemical + biofilm process，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management95
technology.technologicalApplicability: 描述的工业流程用于生产肥皂和合成洗涤剂，该过程涉及使用表面活性剂、油脂、烧碱、酸等，在所有规模的操作中使用复配工艺。废水中污染物的末端治理技术包括使用物理、化学和生物（好氧和生物膜）处理组合来处理废水、化学需氧量、氨氮、石油相关废物、有机结合氮和总磷。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码26,四级代码2681文件，在完整版文件中第3007页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution phosphorus, totalisPhysical + chemical + biofilm process，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management90

污染物指标总磷的末端治理技术是物理+化学+生物膜法，其效率为90，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水处理设施年耗电量（千瓦时/年）/（污水处理设施的所有耗电设备额定功率（千瓦）×污水处理设施年运行时间（小时/年）），①本系数适用于同时生产肥（香）皂、粉状洗涤剂、液体洗涤剂等多种产品的企业。当采用高塔喷粉工艺生产洗衣粉时，需按粉状洗涤剂的产污系数，另外统计废气污染物的产排量。②由于洗涤剂生产中使用的原料品种较多，系数表单中列举了几种常用原料，实际生产时并不局限于此。。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为总磷，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为总磷
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution phosphorus, totalisPhysical + chemical + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management87

污染物指标总磷的末端治理技术是物理+化学+好氧生物处理法，其效率为87，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水处理设施年耗电量（千瓦时/年）/（污水处理设施的所有耗电设备额定功率（千瓦）×污水处理设施年运行时间（小时/年）），①本系数适用于同时生产肥（香）皂、粉状洗涤剂、液体洗涤剂等多种产品的企业。当采用高塔喷粉工艺生产洗衣粉时，需按粉状洗涤剂的产污系数，另外统计废气污染物的产排量。②由于洗涤剂生产中使用的原料品种较多，系数表单中列举了几种常用原料，实际生产时并不局限于此。。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为总磷，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为总磷

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisPhysical + chemical + biofilm process，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management91，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / normal production time (hours/year)
